page.title: 07A Day in my Life
page.content: Today is Saturday. My mum gets me up and I get dressed and go to the kitchen to get the milk ready to feed the lambs. I live on a farm, and therefore I have a different{lifestyle from the children in my class who live in the town. I have to help look after the animals. I have five brothers and two sisters. Most of have a job to do to help on the farm. After I have fed the{lambs}I have my breakfast, which is toast and syrup. Everyone on the farm is busy because it is time for{silaging}. After breakfast, I go up to the dam, and go out on the boat with pellets to feed the fish and watch them jump. Afterwards I go down and have my dinner, and help my mum and sisters with the dishes. Then I get sticks for the hut, which is down at the{Bladnoch river...
